bug.author: aaudiber
bug.summary: Formatting a large embedded journal takes a long time
bug.description: Alluxio Version: alluxio-2.0.0-preview Describe the bug The embedded journal format command is equivalent to running rm -rf journal/*, so it should be very fast. However, when we initialize the embedded journal, it tries to index all journal log files. This can take minutes with tens of millions of files. To Reproduce Create 30 million files and try to run format. It takes 2-3 minutes. Expected behavior format should run in seconds
